headline.main: 2 GIRLS ON AIR TOUR FOR BRITISH RELIEF; Fliers to Visit Twelve Cities in Bundles for Britain Drive

lead_paragraph: MINEOLA, L.I., Oct. 26 -- Miss Barbara Kent, a 22-year-old British war nurse, and Helen Peek, 24, of Fairfield, Conn., both licensed pilots, took off today in a twoplace Piper Cub Cruiser monoplane on a three-week good-will visit to twelve cities in behalf of Bundles for Britain, Inc.
abstract: plane takes off on good-will tour; illus; 3 new bundles projects announced
snippet: MINEOLA, L.I., Oct. 26 -- Miss Barbara Kent, a 22-year-old British war nurse, and Helen Peek, 24, of Fairfield, Conn., both licensed pilots, took off today in a twoplace Piper Cub Cruiser monoplane on a three-week good-will visit to twelve cities ...

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
